title: The Age of Terror 3/4 - In the Name of God  2002  Discovery
description:
The Age of Terror 3/4 - In the Name of God  2002  Discovery
 
This series was produced by 3BM Television Ltd and shown through the Discovery Channel Europe in 2002, to coincide with the first anniversary of the September11th attacks in America.

50:13
683 MB

Part 3: "In the Name of God"

This third episode charts the rise of the most frightening and unstoppable terror groups in history: the religious terrorists. Contributors ranging from the spiritual leaders of religious terrorist groups Hamas and Hezbollah to former Prime Minister Netanyahu of Israel, reveal how terrorist atrocities by both Jewish and Islamic extremists over the past three decades have transformed the battle for land in the Middle East into a Holy War which threatens to engulf the world.

The film begins with the simultaneous hijacking of four Western passenger airlines in Jordan in September 1970, and ends with the attack by Islamic radicals on the U.S. in September 2001

Actual footage of the events and interviews with many of the surviving terrorists provide a profound, multi-sided examination of the story of terrorism.

Directed and written by Jon Blair and Daniel Korn.
